extensionDescription.message: Customize timers to run your scripts.

optionPageTimerTitle.description: Title of the timers' tab in the option page.

optionPageTimerButtonAdd.description: The add button in the timers' tab.

optionPageTimerButtonRefresh.description: The refresh button in the timers' tab.

optionPageTimerListEmpty.description: Hint shown when the timer list is empty.

optionPageTimerListEnable.description: The header of the 1st row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListName.description: The header of the 2nd row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListType.description: The header of the 3rd row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListLast.description: The header of the 4th row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListLastResult.description: The header of the 5th row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListNext.description: The header of the 6th row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListModify.description: The header of the 7th row of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListButtonEdit.description: The tooltip of edit button of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListButtonDelete.description: The tooltip of delete button of the timer list.

optionPageTimerListRefreshSuccess.description: Hint when refresh the timer list successfully.

optionPageTimerListRefreshFail.description: Hint when fail to refresh the timer list.

optionPageTimerFormName.description: The name of the form's 1st item.

optionPageTimerFormType.description: The name of the form's 2nd item.

optionPageTimerFormTypeOnBoot.description: The 1st selection of the form's 2nd item.

optionPageTimerFormTypeAfterBoot.description: The 2nd selection of the form's 2nd item.

optionPageTimerFormTypeDaily.description: The 3th selection of the form's 2nd item.

optionPageTimerFormTypeInterval.description: The 4th selection of the form's 2nd item.

optionPageTimerFormTypeOnce.description: The 5th selection of the form's 2nd item.

optionPageTimerFormDelay.description: The name of the form's 3th item.

optionPageTimerFormTimePoint.description: The name of the form's 4th item.

optionPageTimerFormTimeInterval.description: The name of the form's 5th item.

optionPageTimerFormRetry.description: The name of the form's 6th item.

optionPageTimerFormRetryInterval.description: The name of the form's 7th item.

optionPageTimerFormScripts.description: The name of the form's 8th item.

optionPageTimerFormCancel.description: The cancel button of the form.

optionPageTimerFormConfirm.description: The confirm button of the form.

optionPageMessageTitle.description: Title of the messages' tab in the option page.

optionPageMessageButtonRefresh.description: The refresh button in the messages' tab.

optionPageMessageButtonAllRead.description: The button for marking all messages as read.

optionPageMessageListRefreshSuccess.description: Hint when refresh the message list successfully.

optionPageMessageListRefreshFail.description: Hint when fail to refresh the message list.

optionPageMessageListEmpty.description: Hint shown when message list is empty.

optionPageSettingTitle.description: Title of the setting's tab in the option page.

optionPageSettingItemsPerPage.description: The 1st option in the setting's tab.

optionPageSettingMaxMessages.description: The 2nd option in the setting's tab.

optionPageSettingMaxMessagesHint.description: Hint of the 2nd option in the setting's tab.

optionPageSettingItemsShown.message: Messages Shown in The Popup Page
optionPageSettingItemsShown.description: The 3rd option in the setting's tab.

optionPageSettingBadgeOnlyFail.message: Only Show The Number of Fail Unread Messages on Icon
optionPageSettingBadgeOnlyFail.description: The 4th option in the setting's tab.

popupPageButtonSeeMore.description: The see more button in the popup page.

popupPageButtonAllRead.description: The mark all as read button in the popup page.

popupPageMessageListItemHint.description: The tooltip of the message list item in the popup page.

popupPageMessageListEmpty.description: Hint shown when message list is empty in the popup page.
